mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.user_id, u.user_name, i.order_id, i.subject, i.category AS categoryCode, i.status AS statusCode, i.reply, i.created_at, i.updated_at FROM INQUIRY i JOIN USER u ON i.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY i.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.user_id, u.user_name, i.order_id, i.subject, i.content, i.category AS categoryCode, i.status AS statusCode, i.reply, i.created_at, i.updated_at FROM INQUIRY i JOIN USER u ON i.user_id = u.user_id WHERE i.inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
UPDATE INQUIRY SET category = #{category}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
